docs.snippet: With the Knicks floundering, the Nets have an opportunity to seize control of the New York basketball scene, but their enigmatic point guard must decide to take the lead....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the Knicks floundering, the Nets have an opportunity to seize control of the New York basketball scene, but their enigmatic point guard must decide to take the lead.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column questions whether Brooklyn Nets point guard Deron Williams is ready or willing to lead team to championship.

headline.main: Nets’ Hopes Rest on Deron Williams, if He’s Up to Carrying Them
headline.print_headline: Nets’ Hopes Rest on Williams, if He’s Up to Carrying Them

docs.snippet: Olympiakos Piraeus won the Greek Super League title without kicking a ball on Sunday after  Panathinaikos suffered a shock 2-1 defeat at Panthrakikos.    Panathinaikos dropped to third spot and Vitor Pereira’s Olympiakos, who play Levadiakos...
docs.lead_paragraph: Olympiakos Piraeus won the Greek Super League title without kicking a ball on Sunday after  Panathinaikos suffered a shock 2-1 defeat at Panthrakikos.    Panathinaikos dropped to third spot and Vitor Pereira’s Olympiakos, who play Levadiakos at 1930 local time, are 10 points ahead of second-placed PAOK Salonika with three matches to play.

headline.main: Olympiakos Crowned Greek Champions as Panathinaikos Lose
headline.print_headline: Olympiakos Crowned Greek Champions as Panathinaikos Lose

docs.snippet: At Cornell, the benefits of having an on-campus dairy extend beyond a diverse dining hall menu to helping change workout recovery habits....
docs.lead_paragraph: At Cornell, the benefits of having an on-campus dairy extend beyond a diverse dining hall menu to helping change workout recovery habits.
docs.abstract: Cornell's own dairy processing plant has produced 1 percent low-fat chocolate milk that its athletes use for recovery; is now working on a protein drink called Big Red Refuel.

headline.main: Cornell’s Chocolate Milk Fills Refueling Gap
headline.print_headline: Cornell’s Chocolate Milk Fills Refueling Gap
